original: Ljungwall, Swen, byggnadsingenjör. Mariestad, f. 24/1/85 i Örebro av bygg-mäst. Lars L. o. Selma Augusta Jansson. G. m. Ruth Löf. Barn: Karin f. 15, Barbro 20, Kerstin 24. — Utex. fr. Tekn. byggn :yrkessk. i Sthlm 04. Medarb. i faderns firma 04-09, egen företagare sed. 10. Styr :led. i Väs-tergötl.-Gbgs Järnv., Fribärande Trä-^ konstruktioner samt Skarab. Läns’ Hyp:fören., ordf. i Mariestads drätselkamm., led. av byggn :ndn. RVO.
translated: Ljungwall, Swen, building engineer. Mariestad, b. 24/1/85 in Örebro, son of master builder Lars L. and Selma Augusta Jansson. Married to Ruth Löf. Children: Karin, b. 15, Barbro, b. 20, Kerstin, b. 24. — Graduated from Technical Building Vocational School in Stockholm in 1904. Worked for father's company from 1904 to 1909, became a self-employed entrepreneur since 1910. Board member of Västergötland-Göteborg Railway Company, Free-bearing Timber Constructions, and Skaraborg County Mortgage Association. Chairman of the Mariestad Municipal Council, member of the Building Inspection Board. Knight of the Royal Order of Vasa (RVO).

awards.name: Knight of the Royal Order of Vasa
